mapper.sql: ID, EN_NAME, CN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, LENGTH, NULLALBE, IS_PK, DEFAULT_VALUE

target.ID as "id", target.EN_NAME as "enName", target.CN_NAME as "cnName", target.DATA_TYPE as "dataType", target.LENGTH as "length", target.NULLALBE as "nullalbe", target.IS_PK as "isPk", target.DEFAULT_VALUE as "defaultValue", dict.value as "nullalbeCn"
mapper.insert: insert into target_info (ID, EN_NAME, CN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, LENGTH, NULLALBE, IS_PK, DEFAULT_VALUE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nullalbe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into target_info
ID,
EN_NAME,
CN_NAME,
DATA_TYPE,
LENGTH,
NULLALBE,
IS_PK,
DEFAULT_VALUE,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{length,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nullalbe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update target_info
EN_NAME = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_NAME = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NULLALBE = #{nullalbe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PK = #{isPk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_VALUE = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update target_info set EN_NAME = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_NAME = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NULLALBE = #{nullalbe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PK = #{isPk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_VALUE = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from target_info target left join sys_dictionary dict on dict.TYPE = 'YES_NO' and target.NULLALBE = dict.`KEY`
target.EN_NAME like '%' || #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
target.CN_NAME like '%' || #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
order by target.ID limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from target_info target left join sys_dictionary dict on dict.TYPE = 'YES_NO' and target.NULLALBE = dict.`KEY`
target.EN_NAME like '%' || #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
target.CN_NAME like '%' || #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
order by target.ID limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
